text: beshak khuda hee ke paas qayaamat (ke aane) ka ilm hai aur vahee (jab mauqa munaasib dekhata hai) paanee barasaata hai aur jo kuchh auraton ke pet mein (nar maada) hai jaanata hai aur koee shakhs (itana bhee to) nahin jaanata ki vah khî€¼ud kal kya karega aur koee shakhs ye (bhee) nahin jaanata hai ki vah kis sar zameen par mare (gade) ga beshak khuda (sab baaton se) aagaah khabaradaar hai
